{{Description|Once, in the ancient mansion of [[Umigozen]], famed throughout Inazuma there was a window that could be used to enjoy wine and observe the flowers outside. Now the mansion lies empty, and only bandits and thieves dwell within.|Tutelage: Umigozen's Mansion}}
'''Palace in a Pool''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] in [[Inazuma]]. It contains one level, '''Tutelage: Umigozen's Mansion'''.

==Unlocking the Domain==
*First, use an [[Electrograna|Electrogranum]] to activate all four [[Lightning Strike Probe]]s, which unlocks the four [[Electro Monument]]s.
*Activate the Elemental Monument.
*Jump into the hole and swim through the small opening towards the root.
** [[File:Suigetsu Pool - Floating Crate Locations.png|thumb|The locations of the four Floating Crates when the water has been partly lowered.]] Four [[Wooden Crate]]s can be found in the water. They cannot be found after the water level has been completely lowered.
*Climb up the root, and activate the 3 wall switches to open the door.
*Enter the next room, and climb up the wall on the right.
*Activate the  floor switch to fully drain the water.

==Notes==
You need to move several sliding doors to acquire 2 amulets to open the final gate. Some of the wall dividers can also be broken by attacks.

The domain contains the following interactable objects:

*4 Artifact [[Investigation|Investigation Points]]
*1 [[Common Chest]] in a room behind a sliding door
*1 [[Precious Chest]] before the exit
